subject_information.address: 230 Tiffany Mountain Suite 863, South Michael, KY 25205

suspicious_activity.narrative: Between February and July 2025, Michael Stanley (ID: CUST_0062) conducted multiple transactions with varying amounts. Notably, from July 27-29, 2025, there were five large wire transfers totaling $169,272.24. This rapid movement of funds, especially the large outgoing wire transfers, is indicative of layering, a money laundering technique. The activity appears to be structured to evade reporting requirements.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: The customer has a medium risk rating and has made multiple large outgoing wire transfers in a short time frame. This rapid movement of funds is indicative of layering, a money laundering technique.
